name: Our Savior
description:
Game submission for RetroJam gamejam.

inspiration:Donkey Kong

Designed console: Super Nintendo Entertainment System

Controls: Arrow keys

the game: Dump the toxic wastes away and let water barrels fall on flower pot. Help flower reach 10 points and win the game. If points drop to 0, then game ends.

Don't fall

Background ,generator and containers artwork: Ansimuz

Font:Kenney
